column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#id=1
#text=Every week I go to the grocery store to get food for my family .
#id=2
#text=I write a list of all the foods I will need and gather together any coupons I will be able to use .
#id=3
#text=I drive to the grocery store and get a cart to put the food in .
#id=4
#text=I take out my list and coupons and put them where I will be able to see them easily .
#id=5
#text=I walk up and down the aisles finding the food on my list .
#id=6
#text=I put each one into the grocery cart as I find it , then cross it off my list .
#id=7
#text=When I have all of the food I need , I take my cart full of food to the register area .
#id=8
#text=I empty my cart , put all of the food onto the belt and hand the cashier my coupons .
#id=9
#text=She scans the bar codes on each item and places it into a bag , then she scans the coupons .
#text=When everything has been scanned , the cashier tells me the total cost and I give her the money for the food .
#text=I place the bags into my cart and walk back to my car .
